intro: Lasianthus pedunculatus, commonly known as the slender lasianthus, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its slender, erect stem and small, opposite leaves. Its flowers are typically white or pale pink, clustered in small inflorescences. It is often grown as an ornamental plant due to its delicate appearance and ease of cultivation.
